question: when was the movie the king and i made
api_result: The movie "The King and I" was originally released in 1956. It is a musical film adaptation of the 1951 Broadway musical of the same name, which was based on the 1944 novel "Anna and the King of Siam" by Margaret Landon. The film was directed by Walter Lang and stars Deborah Kerr and Yul Brynner in the lead roles.
